==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Hushang:''' If only I could break into the [[Liyue]] market...
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Duel
:;(Opens [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Hushang/Duel: Hushang|Genius Invokation TCG match interface]])
:;(If the player loses the match)
:::'''Hushang:''' I won! As a toy maker, I'm practically a colleague of these card makers and of course I understand how things work!
:;(If the player wins the match)
:::'''Hushang:''' Alas... What's so fun about cards? Come on, guest, look at the toys I've made...
:{{DIcon}} What are you planning?
::'''Hushang:''' It's about the toy trade. I hear that toys from [[Snezhnaya]] sell very well in Liyue, and now I'm feeling some regret.
::'''Hushang:''' If I could have seized the opportunity to bring my handmade toys to Liyue, they'd definitely be more popular now than anything from Snezhnaya!
::'''Hushang:''' What could a frigid place like that know about a child's heart?
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Hushang:''' Why, why!?
{{Dialogue End}}
